'Cally Stone' is a main character in the television series Dark Oracle. She is
portrayed by Paula Brancati . She has a fraternal twin brother Lance Stone in
which she is the younger twin out of the two . The two of them believe their
lives are being controlled by a comic book, "Dark Oracle".
